context: PlayStation Network is the unified online multiplayer gaming and digital media delivery service provided by Sony Computer Entertainment for PlayStation 3 and <a3_0><b7_0><b8_0>PlayStation Portable<b8_0/><b7_0/><a3_0/>, announced during the 2006 PlayStation Business Briefing meeting in <a0_0><b4_0>Tokyo<b4_0/><a0_0/>. The service is always connected, free, and includes <a2_0><b6_0>multiplayer support<b6_0/><a2_0/>. The network enables online gaming, the PlayStation Store, PlayStation Home and other services. PlayStation Network uses <a1_0><b5_0>real<b5_0/><a1_0/> currency and PlayStation Network Cards as seen with the PlayStation Store and PlayStation Home.
